title: Ep50: BBW Lovin in Adult Entertainment feat Cake XxX
itunes:title: Ep50: BBW Lovin in Adult Entertainment feat Cake XxX
description:
In a hilarious episode, Mandii and Weezy are joined by adult film producer, web master, and author Cake XxX of xxxcakefactory.com. The group delves into the BBW world of adult entertainment and why a big woman may be able to steal your man. Find out if there's any money to be made in porn anymore and how money stays circulating both in front of and behind the camera. Also, are into erotic novels? Cake brought her book "The Hour of Neglect" into the studio and Mandii has fun reading a dirty part out of the book. Be sure to check out our guest Cake on Instagram @xxxcakefactory and check out her sites xxxcakefactory.com and www.bubblebuttcuntz.com for all of your BBW pleasures! Also, thanks to everyone who has been supporting us! Become a patron today for bonus episodes and the full video recording of this episode at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
